meanings.definition: The skin of a young goat.
meanings.sent1: The kidskins felt soft to the touch.
meanings.sent2: She wore a jacket made of kidskins to keep warm.
meanings.sent3: The kidskins were used to make a cozy blanket for the baby goat.
meanings.sent4: The kidskins gleamed in the sunlight, a reminder of the young goat's life.
meanings.sent5: The kidskins had a faint smell of the fields where the goats roamed.

meanings.definition: A garment made from the skin of a young goat.
meanings.sent1: The kidskins coat was her favorite for winter.
meanings.sent2: He bought a pair of kidskins gloves to protect his hands.
meanings.sent3: The kidskins dress shimmered under the lights at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her kidskins boots carried her through the muddy path with ease.
meanings.sent5: The kidskins hat kept her head warm on the chilly day.
